lines.text: Allura, do you have some way of messaging people and sending messages like super quickly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An instant message app?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Actually, depending on who it is."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fassbender?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender. He's with Wilhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be perfectly honest, if it's a creature that I'm relatively familiar with, I could send it "to them instantaneously. Any distance. Across the planes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many people per day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Across the planes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Across the planes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many times could you do that per day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could probably muster it three times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is major! This is huge!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Allura, did you ever meet with our father in Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, many times, actually. Yes, he was an interesting individual of the council. Especially "back when Sir Gregory was with us. But they were friends. Yes, I did meet him."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, dwell on that one. Well, that would save us an enormous amount of energy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be great! And me, two seventh-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sir Gregory Fence. That was when you first came to Emon. He's the gentleman who was part of the council. You were hired by their father to go and inspect because he went missing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember demons in the succubus' house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll take me a 7th-level spell to get there, and then I'll have to burn my 8th-level spell to get back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well let's send word to them. Then save us the talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so. You require word to your father?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who else?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's next on the list?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bigger allies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Ravenites? The Herd. What about the Herd?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think she knows anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can describe them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got to be somebody she knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have to have met them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kraghammer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever met somebody in charge in Kraghammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a number of individuals I've met there, yes. I cannot guarantee they'll be eager to "jump into this fray. I can try."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's possible, let's put that on the possible list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about that town that we saved from dissolution?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Westruun, they have the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Westruun was decimated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have Fassbender, they could send a soldier with the Fassbender.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they have Fassbender.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Air Ashari? Do we need to talk to any of them? You could do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theoretically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Ravenites? You don't know any Ravenites, do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, what about Tooma? Who's the dragonborn in Vasselheim?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tofor!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tofor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, nice pull!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know Tofor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tofor? Yes. Tofor's in Emon right now. "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's one of the council members, one of the survivors who is currently working with-- apparently, from what you've heard--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Clasp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the person at the Slayer's Take Vanessa?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vanessa, from the Slayer's Take, do you know her, Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've not met Vanessa, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, who do you know that's really powerful, that also maybe has an army that could help us? Anyone you know that we don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think we've tapped out most of our resources at this point! I've reached out to "members of the Arcana Pansophical, but many of them have their own issues to deal with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're dicks, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they're just busy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that one guy we met, he was a real dick, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any underdark-y type people? Do they like us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Long, white hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Purple eyes. He was in Marquet. Is that what we're thinking of? Am I thinking of a different place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if he's a member of the Arcana Pansophical."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's start with Syngorn and then see how it works, all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever met my father, Korren of the Air Ashari?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had no correspondence from the Air Ashari. My apologies. I'm doing what I can."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, you're great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've saved us a trip to the Feywild and back. Send word that if they can contact the werewolves, the werewolves owe us a favor, I suppose. Not that they would help with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If that's the information you need sent, that would require me to make two messages. Just "to cover both those bases. To their father--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just get the father.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was his name again?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Syldor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Syldor. Syldor, right. Two messages, to gather the army of Emon. And Syngorn, to return "and head towards Fort Daxio."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, if they could get pop Syngorn over to Fort Daxio, that'd be killer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if that's how the magic works, but I'll put a message in there for that and to "look for werewolves."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As part of the message, that if there's a pack with the werewolves---

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that vital? Should we care about that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He fucked some shit up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure. Yeah. Why not? Second message: Bring-- what was his name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Indala.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Michael J. Fox.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ukurat.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Ukurat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. And I'll enquire about bringing Ukurat and the werewolves. All right! I've got "some messaging to do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And when you're back in Whitestone, send the airship our way loaded with food and supplies if you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell them to be on guard!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put Kima on there, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And anybody who wishes to come fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kash, Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the airship? Or send them through a tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or Zahra!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When you write to our father, will you tell him his children need him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do that, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if that will help at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll call for Kima, I'll bring our allies with us. Either me or Shaun have to stay behind to "maintain the illusion, so your choice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shaun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so Shaun will stay behind--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's certain death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Staying in Whitestone is the exact opposite of certain death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's protecting everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our purpose is to stay to make sure that they do not

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the opposite of certain death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I'll get these messages off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god is this happening right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes two steps back and puts one finger in the air, and as it curls her eyes glaze over with crackling blue energy. And you watch her tongue click across her mouth like she's speaking quietly to herself. Her eyes come back. "All right, I've notified your father, Syldor." Once again her eyes glaze over with crackling blue energy. Her fingers trace in the air, and it looks like she's speaking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick, everyone hide when she's doing this! So when she comes back, we'll all be--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She goes back we're like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like she's putting on a VR helmet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." Her eyes return. "Both messages have been delivered to your father. Who else "should require a message?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know anyone else on our list, do you? The Slayer's Take, you don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be smart to send one to Warmaster Mikael as well. I know he's in Syngorn as well, but it might be good to have a couple of people there bringing word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishes. "Very well! The army's been notified."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see if she can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait, what about the Clasp or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! That is all that she can do. Actually, no. She can cast at a higher level, so she can do more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Clasp? Do they like us or hate us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They hate us, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that the Clasp are going to be far more useful once they figure out the dragon has left the city. And I don't even think they necessarily need to be notified of such a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, then we're good for now. We just keep buffeting up this place? Do we have to plan an ambush? How does this work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go in. Emon, right now. Full ball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. You and me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Full blush.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could go to the Fire Plane really quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're hoping to tempt him here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you so anxious to go to the Fire Plane all of a sudden?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an object. It's from the Fire Plane. We are facing a fire dragon, which means it's something unbelievably useful or not useful at all. We need ice weapons, we need cold weapons, and we don't have any.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you think that we're going to find those in the Fire Plane?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either that or in that ship that we left behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have knowledge of dragons quite well, actually, Vex. You do know that red dragons are not vulnerable to cold, by any means. They're just resistant to fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're just resistant to fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it doesn't matter, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they vulnerable to anything that i know of?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Insults, cheese.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peanuts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bruised bananas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Bruised bananas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Pike! Did you know that we have all the Vestiges except for the one in the Fire Plane, and you'll never guess what it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it? I forgot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some plate armor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's some plate armor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of the Dawn Martyr.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which might be clutch for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Allura was saying we don't have time--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One day! What's one day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't know if it's going to be one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, when we get there we'll find out! If it's taking too long, we'll pop back! These messages are going to take a while to deliver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not like a Wonka-vator, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'd have to spend the night there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That makes me a little nervous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, one night. They've all eaten today. We're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, no there is no vulnerability--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just fine with fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just pure death and destruction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, at least that's a bonus in that means that anything will work as well as anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we go back to the plan about how we intend to get Thordak here? We were playing with the idea of fooling Thordak into thinking that Raishan had been killed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Raishan was going to feed him the information that he thought that we were here, and then vanish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's it? We think

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Raishan will be clever enough to give him just enough to get him here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think Raishan would be willing to let us hack off a little bit of flesh to send?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'd have to ask Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd have to ask Raishan. She might be willing to let me do such a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we establish a way to contact her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have no way to contact her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No wait! Didn't we send her on a mission?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we did! She was checking on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She was going to bring us back some dude. And we're not even there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck! Asum was going to come back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To not where we are right now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was two things. It was Asoon and...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Asoon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bassoon, whatever. And what was the other thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some other guy. Was it some other guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit nails!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The last time we talked to Raishan she said, "All right. I'll be back in a day." And then we got out of there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well it's still a day. It hasn't been a day yet. We haven't spent the night here yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no. We haven't spent the night yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh she was going to Emon to hold up the bluff that everything was cool was Thordak, right? She was going to bluff, and then she was also going to try to bring back Seeker Asum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right. We can head home from here. Someone has got to go home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody's got to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some of us can go, and some of us can stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll go talk to Raishan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you can't leave because you're building, or can you go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can leave, we've got one working. If I stay, I'll have two working. If I stay longer, I'll have three working. But I'll go where we're most useful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you want a chunk of her? Or like, a little piece of her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something, like a claw or something to drop at Thordak's feet. It'll help with the bluff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you think that he would lead the charge to come find us? In his eyes he could just send one of his peons to come smash us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thordak?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's sent all of his dragons and nothing's worked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the goal. We kill the peons, and then he comes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the more he sends, the more we kill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we go mess up something on the edge of Emon, and then we're like, "Yeah! Fuck you!" And then we take off. Or like bamf back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't believe he'll suffer that much indignity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we tell Thordak where we are he'll probably come with that wyvern army that almost took out Whitestone, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we need to have a lot of people here. To fight them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, to balance that out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that also means that the Clasp will have an opportunity to take back the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he's gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he leaves with his army, yes. If he leaves his army to actually manage the city--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we talked about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either way, it's stretching him thin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a bit of a practice round if we go to the Fire Plane? Let's say we get there and it's a total shit show, right? Nothing but death waiting for us. We change our mind, we leave. But at least we see where Thordak's been all this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the other thing that we could glean from the fire realm is possibly figuring out a little bit more about the connection he had with it and to the heart stone, ember seed thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Allura, can you send a message to Gilmore, or Cassandra, or Kima even? Maybe just those three. They're the only ones who know about Raishan. Let them know that Raishan is bringing back Asum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but just to make sure everything's fine with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do that, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then we're going to the Fire Plane?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Just give it a look-see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just pop on down for a bit to the basement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I've got a timeshare there. It will be killer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd like to bring Raishan with us to the Fire Plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No fucking way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. What are we going to do? She's not going to come.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not going to come to the Fire Plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She knows it better than anybody else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not going to come to the Fire Plane. But you're right, she does. If I were her I wouldn't come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you want to go, Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, to the Fire Plane? I mean, I can. My skills are probably better used elsewhere. But "whatever you think is wisest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need agents on the ground right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things need to move forward here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then you stay here and keep running things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If opportunities present themselves to bring more people here or to gather more allies, take them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's pop on down!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My gosh, you guys, the Dawn Martyr is in the City of Brass. Which I'm pretty sure is overrun with fire elementals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a "myth," though, right? And that was probably written a long time ago which means shit could have totally changed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus now we have a lot of money. We can buy our way through the Fire Plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this stupid? Are we going to die in the Fire Plane?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's a bad idea. I don't think we have time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never tell me the odds!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's a Vestige there for Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we can go. We can hit the Fire Ashari first and see if Cerkonos is there and maybe see if Cerkonos wants to help us out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're all alive in two weeks I'd be happy to go and get armor for Pike, but there's dragons on top of our backs right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, you're certain as soon as he finds out about Vorugal's death that he's going to seek retribution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was two days after Umbrasyl's fall."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've also totally spilled our spaghetti with Raishan. She's not going to wait, she's going to push things forward. I don't think we have time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, Vax. Do you have a suggestion in place, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that we talk to Raishan. These two chuckle-heads convince her to let us take a pound of her flesh, or ten. Somehow dump it insultingly at Thordak's feet and brace for the worst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm okay with that, but how do we get in touch with her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get in touch with her when she goes back to the place that shall not be named. But all of that is going to take days. And we can't do that until the armies have arrived here in Fort Daxio, which could take another few days. I don't know where Syngorn lands when it comes back to this plane. I assume it's not next door. They're going to take days to get here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, Thordak's going to send out look-sees like he did over Whitestone, as soon as he finds out Umbrasyl is dead. It doesn't mean he'll launch an attack, because where is he going to attack? He doesn't know where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! And if he's searching for us, what better place to be than on a different plane?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go to a different plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think he went to the place which shall not be named because Raishan tipped him off that we were there?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did he go to the place that shall not be named, then? Why did he look there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vorugal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a place to be looked at. And they flew over and didn't see it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think they were just scanning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All in favor of the Fire Plane, say "Aye."

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was only two! Wow, that's pretty rough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that was four. They're pansies and won't say anything with their voice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All in favor of staying say, "cooter."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two to one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go! Even if it sucks, we can just come right back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just bamf right back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can always come back. And I would like to maybe see if we could find out more about the ember seed. Fire Plane!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean there's nothing else we can do today, is there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feed more soldiers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Supplies are on the way. Soldiers are on the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cows eat hay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! So we say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gather ye rosebuds, while ye may. Vox Machina is dying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you hear back from anyone in Syngorn or anyone anywhere, will you send us a message?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, and I will notify the general of these plans before I head on that way. Very well. Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretend like we were never here. Let them know. Pretend like we were never here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay safe, friends." She turns and leaves the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are so stupid. This is going to be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! I love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we hold hands again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a tree stride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, well, okay. If we are--

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Plane Shift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, do we want to stop off at the Fire Ashari, and pick up Cerkonos? I think it's not a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I think we should. Because they were there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and you said we can instantaneously jump over, grab him, and shift--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once I tree stride we can, there's that portal there, and we can go through the portal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I am a big fan of the tour guide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tour guide. All right. We're going to tree stride to the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Most of the trees near or within the courtyard of the fort are thin, and maybe like a foot to a half a foot wide, and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get skinny, get skinny!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did see that cluster of brownish-red forest canopy across the ravine. But that's the only real--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Across the ravine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, on the opposite side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's hoof it. I need to stretch my legs anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, how big was the ravine, like crossing the Grand Canyon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long to get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about a third of the width of the Grand Canyon, maybe? It's a big ravine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Plane Shift us over to the Ashari? It has to be to another plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has to be to another plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, can you turn us into a bunch of hummingbirds, or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can turn a couple of us into some things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just something little? So that we can pop to the tree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You two can fly, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would take you a handful of hours to walk to this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. So let's fucking do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Told you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At a brisk pace on foot you'll get there in three hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put Pike on my shoulders because I'm getting ready for my Rocky training montage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get as many of us on the carpet as possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) RIP the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should feel bad!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should feel

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And whereas previously you only thought maybe a little over 20 existed, it looks like maybe there's a good 50 or 60 that actually are beginning to rebuild the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to blow it up again, woo! Table flip!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at that! Keyleth! There's so many more people than you thought!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's still kids!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like two kids! One of those days they might grow up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to take like, 20 of them to the fight. And they'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (nervous laughter) Come on, kids! Have a sword!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a big "if."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't take you long to find Cerkonos, who at this point in time has regrown his arm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I knew he'd be all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He approaches now, his darkened skin tattooed, his long hair past his shoulders. He approaches with an expression of surprise and mild confusion. "It is good to to see all of you. I "ask, what brings you to the doorstep of the Pyrah Ashari?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And in the time that he has broken out of the Fire Plane, it seems there is a certain magic that is allowing him to essentially turn Emon into a second Fire Plane. We believe he still has some sort of connection here based on the binding magic that was used on him in the past. Something called an ember seed. Have you heard of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This does not stir my memory reserves. I'm sorry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you remember if Raishan, when she was moving in and out of the Fire Plane, do you remember her mentioning anything about it? Or anything suspicious about wanting to learn about the connection to the Fire Plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She found much of her time in solace in the Cinder "Grove. She was not quick to pick up the druidic magics, but her research was in depth. She spoke "with many elders, myself included."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is the Cinder Grove? Did we pass through the Cinder Grove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Cinder Grove is in the center of the caldera. That's the petrified forest that is surrounding where the actual tear in the boundary is. Where the Fire Ashari hold vigil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wasn't the ember seed connected to the-- Didn't we knock down some pillars when we came to the Fire Plane the last time? Isn't that part of the reason his hold was broken?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was opened more. The portal got weak when it was around the solstice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. But remember, we were here for your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We fought Cerkonos, who was essentially a giant elemental. I don't remember us breaking anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, when you first came here it was part of your Aramente, and you guys just passed through the tear. And you battled Cerkonos and the other druids in elemental form as part of a test. There was some stones on the other side but there was nothing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, maybe you just thought that and were freaking out a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we know he busted through. You know the Fire Plane better than anyone. We are also looking for the Plate of Dawnmartyr in the City of Brass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you say the City of Brass, you watch his demeanor change. His arms cross, and he leans back into himself. "That is not a place for the Ashari. It is a place of tyranny and greed. It is "a unique mix of those who exist there, and if you are intent on going, I am happy to escort you, but "it is a different experience than we are used to, and perhaps yourself as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a large city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is quite big, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extreme measures must be taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The choice is yours. You have come this far."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long is the journey to the City of Brass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From the tear, it is about three days' foot travel." Your Plane Shift spell can bring you directly to a location as long as you're aware of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go right there. Be right in the center of the city. Land right in Main Street, next to the Reebok store.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels like it's going to be really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, everything we do is, right? I mean every time we've faced a dragon, we go find another Vestige. It feels like the rhythm is right on this. Let's go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're gone, we come back, Thordak has obliterated everything, including Fort Daxio.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but good news. We're still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're alive! High-five, Scanlan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The stones don't work across planes, do they?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gatestones? No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But Allura's ability to send messages does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. From what she said, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if things start going very haywire, we can let her know that she is to call us immediately and we will drop what we're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could probably figure that out on her own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, whatever we're doing. Even if we're in the middle of fighting some really big fire elementals we just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plane Shift.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course, we'd have to get a message to her to tell her that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She would probably figure that out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't fail. 0% APR.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You big lovable lug. I still think it's a very bad idea. I'll go if you all want to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cerkonos turns to you, Grog, and says, "I do not mean to be misunderstanding. I will take you "to the city, but I will not enter it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm good with that. I mean you'll take us there, right? You'll give us a couple of warnings, maybe point at something if it's terrible, and then you've got to go because it's going to mess with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am of no use in that city."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now why is that, like you've got feelings about it? Or you're afraid of it? Or you'll be powerless there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of all of that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Powerless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many powerful entities that exist in the city. I am not a man for cultured places."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've been before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been near."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just pop in, pop out, guys. What could go wrong?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're gathering forces at Fort Daxio to fight this dragon. And if you can lend any of your power, or have any power you can send, we'd be forever grateful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think you could reach out to Korren?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could. How soon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Soon. That is where we will head immediately when we are done here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Then I will lead you, if you choose to go to this city. And then I will call "for your father, we will send what we can spare."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if you don't want to go inside, I can Plane Shift us there. We don't necessarily need you, I guess? I mean, we need you, but I'm wondering if you'd be better here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No offense taken. If you wish to continue your journey, I can go and try and round up the "Ashari that can fight."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know anything of where Thordak was held?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not know Thordak existed until he tore through our people. So unfortunately not."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anyone here left that Raishan spoke to the most? A confidant? Someone who might have been aiding her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to tell. Many who were near those discussions were slain, I'm sorry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, will you be able to do the mansion inside of the Fire Plane? Or did you already use it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, right? I can do my magic wherever. I have no idea, I've never been to the Fire Plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I mean, but did you already use it today?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I used it yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you would still have the ability to use it today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I think we've done an enormous amount towards getting prepared for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does everything over there fight with fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not everything. But many things there have fire by nature. Or at least, the ability to live "among it. There are many parts of the Fire Plane that you should not traverse. It would destroy you "immediately."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The City of Brass sucks, but we'll be okay going there, ish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's one of the few places that can support a city, so yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kind of hot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is very hot there. The longer you stay, the more difficult it is for such frail beings as "us to exist."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speak for yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In and out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull the trigger, travel agent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay safe. I will see you soon at this Fort Daxio."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was a worthwhile trip already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm setting my armor to fire resistance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything else we need to know, to be safe, to look out for while we're there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just know there are many denizens there that enjoy "the tyranny, so be careful. Don't start any wars."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say while this whole talk's been going on, that I've been unattuning my coldsnap armor and reattuning my bracers of archery?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It will take you guys a short rest to do all that. Plus, with your reattune there. You guys take a short rest while Cerkonos takes a couple of the other nearby Pyrah with him and they head off towards the Cinder Grove. Presumably, to communicate with your father.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask you a question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I have two bows that are awesome, and I'm attuned to both of them, how easy is it to switch in a battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have two bows that are attuned to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. If I chose to attune to the Sky Sentinel and Fenthras instead of the bracers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's possible. But the idea of having one wielded and one on your back, pulling it out. You're not proficient and fast in bow-drawing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'd be an action to switch them out in a battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe. Probably. You could drop one, but then pulling the other one out, getting it around you, arrow out. It would probably take you an action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just go, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm standing there with my eyes closed and my hands out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! That all happened in a millisecond. I was considering things in my brain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm showing my willingness to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go. City of Brass, yo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your brows begin to singe. As you close your eyes instinctually, you open them again. And looking around you see a familiar broken landscape of shattered stone rock, reddish and iron-like in coloration. You see various stone obelisks that are jutting out of the ground from broken and at some points seismic earth that had been pushed up from underneath where gouts of flame occasionally spill out and burst into the sky. The air itself carries a sulfuric and ionized scent to it. You can see darkened clouds of smoke and soot that slowly shift in the distance. Way off towards the horizon, almost the equivalent of a darkened storm in the distance, except it's a sheet of roaring fire. Just taking up an entire quarter of the skyline, miles and miles away from you. You don't know if it's coming closer or further away, but it's frightening. As you glance over your shoulder, you see behind you a glimmer of whatever source of light this land takes into itself reflecting off of dozens upon dozens of reflective metallic buildings and towers and domes. And one large, dark metal wall that surrounds the exterior. You see upon this, what you assume to be the City of Brass. And that's where we're going to go ahead and take a break.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be right back here in a few minutes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right! With the announcement of our winners!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again,

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also, I amass everything and I couldn't get in all the awesome, even into what we put into the slideshow in the episode and in the gallery on Geek & Sundry today. There were so many good costumes and we're blown away by-- I mean, it was a massive amount.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot came in at the eleventh hour, too, so if you didn't see yours in the slideshow-- we still probably saw, but that would be why.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because we've been looking at the hashtag like crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to go ahead and begin with our personal choices, across the bay. You want to start over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I chose the most lovely and wonderful @KinnVelier. Her picture of Pike had the perfect pose, the most wonderful costume, everything was there. Winner, winner, chicken dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My personal choice was @sara-rokhov! I don't know if I said that right, but she did the costume that was closest to the outfit that we wore in the opening credits, which is

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she got, like, real close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was awesome!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cheat. I'm giving mine to @missbelletrist and @miss_riahne for doing Vex and Vax throwing money around and flipping daggers and climbing trees. Great photos, great costumes, great attitude.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go with Woodson Schindler AKA @CriticalCorrupt for his Manleth. He did a bearded Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, it was legit. And his eyeshadow was on point. I just want to say. So @CriticalCorrupt, you're awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, okay! I'm going to go with Karin Rindevall, @karrey over in Gothenburg, for the amazing Percy being very, very busy and at work and reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Upper crust?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And very upper crust. Very fancy. The fanciest. So fancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My choice was an obvious one. It's @cat_cosplay for the cat version of Scanlan, or as I call him, CAT Scan. And for those asking, we're not putting up these pictures right now because we literally just picked them one minute ago, but we'll be retweeting our current, our personal picks of the evening. So you can watch our twitters, or maybe @CriticalRole can tweet them out or something? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well done. My personal choice is @jettiebettie who did an amazing Ripley. Not just costume and presentation, but the intensity of expression, the personality. It was a fantastic capturing of the character and the minute I saw it I was like, oh, there she is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight out of Central Casting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was amazing. Awesome job.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So those are our personal picks and we also all picked a third place, a second place, and a first place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Overall winners.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (dramatic voice) Overall winners. Here they are. Number three: (normally) @kwwins, who is also an artist for us all the time, was chosen for number three for her Minxie/Keyleth transformation pic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so cool! Good concept.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Number two goes to @norfrosch who did the amazing Victor with crazy eyebrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it takes a lot to shame my Victor. Not really, I threw mine together. And then that one, the day after, I saw that picture and went, "Well, damn. I lose." It was amazing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was like, "Oh, she did way better than I did."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And in first place--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to go to a commercial break! Stay tuned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Close up on all of us looking at each other like, who's it going to be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so for an amazing Percy in bird mask, both an amazing photo, amazing costume--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Amazing weapon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (a capella version of Take My Breath Away)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a gathered round of applause for

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just so you know, all of you winners, @CriticalRole on twitter will follow you so you can DM your mailing address and get your wonderful prizes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of the prizes include shirts that I've worn on the stream, some of which I have laundered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god. Some prizes may include part of my dice hoard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to send a weird little Halloween cornucopia of weird. It'll be great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to raid our closets. Hook you guys up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hook it up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, oh no, oh no! Okay, City of Brass, City of Brass, here we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) City of Brass! City of Brass--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody's with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) City of Brass!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you! Just one Doors fan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys take in the intensity of the atmosphere, looking up at the one blaring, bright sun in the sky, locked in that reddish-orange atmosphere above you, you look around as the wind picks up, the heat carrying ash and black soot through, forcing you to wince and keep your eyes somewhat closed. You immediately begin to pull scarves up in front to try and filter this aggressive and caustic air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and cast Protection from Energy on myself with fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? It's a concentration spell, or else I would've taken it too. You can't do it with anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking as to where that giant wall of fire across the horizon is, you see it begin to merge closer and closer, the edge of that sea, until eventually it comes to the City of Brass, which you see behind you-- this large, amazing, vast city of various reflective, metallic surfaces. You see pointed spires, round domes, and hundreds and hundreds of these buildings that sprawl out beyond the wall that you see on the outside of it. What would you guys like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we go any farther, if we want to pull the ripcord, what does that look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean, if we want to go back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to, I think, be in a fairly safe space and give me a minute?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me double check before I say that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we already backing out of this, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm making sure that we're not like, "Oh, we've got to go! Oh shit!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, I lied. It's instantaneous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we all got to be touching?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's our Jenga?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's our code word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super Jenga!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Super Jenga" means everybody run towards each other and link hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So "Jenga" means "I fucked up, my name is Vax." And "Super Jenga" means we have to link hands and bounce.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Duck, duck, goose" means it's playtime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's walk into the City of Brass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys begin stepping towards this, and it is hard to gauge distance on this city's size, even from just arriving in this place.The more you walk, the slower its arrival comes as you begin to take in the sheer immensity of its sprawling expanse. You see little occasional bursts of flame off from the opposite side of the wall, some small shapes coasting over, a little glow pass. And as you get close enough, I'm going to have everyone roll a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got this, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bullshit over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, what did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, and you got--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Muscular. The skin on a few of them appears to be deep crimson or orangish-red. Two of them, the skin actually almost goes to more like a black, a deep soot and ash color. You begin to see more details in the skin. You see horns and large fangs from underneath. You see large, scimitar-like blades to the side. You've seen one of these creatures before. It emerged from the tear in the Fire Plane last time you were there. There are six efreeti that are currently standing guard outside of the gate to the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Genies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Basically. They're really powerful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're very smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Think we can talk to them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, let's parlay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go and talk to them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only one should talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you all looking at me?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because you have the gift of gab.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are really good. Go talk to them, Scanlan. Be super cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greetings! Hello! Hi there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, you're doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say this haphazardly from the distance, you see three of them all of a sudden, their attention right over in your direction. Two of them immediately begin to lift up off the ground and their legs vanish into a plume of flame and smoke as they (whoosh) almost like rockets in the sky, heading over in your direction. The other one goes into a run towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they attacking?

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep a hand on the bow, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Steady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both stand and glance downward at this tiny little gnome by comparison, each of them standing about ten to 12 feet in full height.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The efreetis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The efreetis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's running eventually catches up to you and slows his gait and puts his hands behind his back, puts his chin up, and begins walking. You can see now he has these two long tufts of black hair that are braided into this long braid that floats gently as the heated breeze continues to blow past you. As he begins to approach, he looks out among the rest of your group and then down at this tiny gnome that has stepped up to greet them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We request passage into your city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your business?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are travelling salespeople and we are here to sell our wares.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What wares are you here to sell?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One item in particular, which could be of much value to the people in your city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then show me this item of value."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you want to see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you don't want to enter the city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. It's a pet of ours that we've been travelling with. It's right back there. And I point behind us to an empty space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances over towards the empty space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 feet tall, snarling, growling, just a fucking nightmare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So is it just standing there snarling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, looking real mean and ornery with spit coming off of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. At this point, the three efreeti are glancing in that direction. First off, go ahead and make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the weirdest day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't think the day when we were cows was far weirder? That was pretty weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They glance over. They all very intensely inspect from a distance this goristro that has now appeared, that is snarling approximately how far away from you? The range is 120 feet in the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's say 60 feet back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The central one looks to the efreet to his left, or to the right of you, gives him a nudge, and that efreeti-- that efreet begins to step away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please allow us entry to your city and we will find someone who can afford to touch him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm." The efreet that you halted takes a few more steps, not paying heed as the one that's in front of you goes, "So you're looking to sell this as a servant. This beast will work as a "servant, or does it work in servitude?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It works for me, for the moment, and I can get it to work for someone else for a price. But if your man goes over there, he's going to die, because I will tell my goristro to kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmph. It is rare to see something so small able to control something so vicious and "dangerous." And you see him leaning in now, closer to you. You see these tiny little burning beads of red flame as the center of his eyes, against a black iris. You see, as he gets closer, the grin begins to curl across the rows and rows of sharpened, white, gleaming teeth. He says, "You, "such a small, easy-to-crush creature, can seem to hold dominion over something that exists in places "that would rend your mind asunder."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reach into the bag, and I'm going to grab a little chunk of dragon and a chunk of the previous goristro that we still have some bits of, and drop them in front of him on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (dull thud) (sniff)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those were my other pets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurping) (spitting) He throws them to the ground. He begins speaking in a language that you don't understand. It sounds very much like the slow, rolling fire-bursts of magma pouring down the side of a mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I recognize it, as a druid who has spent time as a fire elemental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize the type. It is the same language spoken by the fire elementals, but you do not speak the language. But the efreet that stepped away has stopped and is taking a moment to look from about a 40-foot distance from the goristro.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (distressed sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud sniff) And begins walking back toward the other efreeti. The one before you, whose face is still up in front of you, is reading you. His head is about the size of your entire body. And he goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll put my hands behind my back and stand up a little taller to meet him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wish to walk the city, then pay the toll."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much would the toll be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much do you think the toll is worth?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If the toll is insufficient, and I find offense at the offer, then you will have bigger "problems than entry. But generosity goes a long way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So like, money? Is it money, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The money that we carry with us is from a far-off land. Will it still be good here? It's gold and platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or would you rather gems?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gems are good as well. Money is money. We work and deal with many creatures from many places "here. What do you offer?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I just, you know what, fuck it? I'm going to put the 20-pound bag of gems in his hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and closes the fingers of his hand around it, then shakes it a little and listens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 pound?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins to pour the gems out. He takes a very keen look at them--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are you and what have you done with Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The world is fucking ending, you guys. How else am I going to use these things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls the tiny drawstring taut once again. "May you enjoy your time in the City of "Brass. Now, I suggest your wineskins be full." And he turns around and the efreeti all begin to walk away towards the entrance to the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loudly and conspicuously I say: Stanley, invisible! And then he poofs away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, I think you let a little bit of scry on the ground there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just get in the city and buy me some new pants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pick up the dragon scales and put them back in the bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Stan Lee voice) Greetings, true believers!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We pick up the dragon parts and we move into the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a very good call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I throw up a little.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did really well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always tip the doorman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm patting Scanlan on the back and wiping his mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, now we're inside this stupid city. Now what do we need to find, a wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we have to-- hang on. Let's do a quick refresher on the impossible needle we have to find in this haystack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait! Because I took a spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A 'Find Item Anywhere' spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Locate Object.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy fucking shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hold. I brought that spell as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has to be within 1000 feet. 1000 feet isn't a whole lot in this really large metropolis, correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go to the front door, we do it once, go to the middle, we do it again. Totally covered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you guys go 2000 feet apart, that's essentially a mile spread.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? How many miles is the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea, you haven't walked inside! You've got no idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are walking towards the door. What do we know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, there's a Beacon of Protection for the Chosen of Pelor. It is gathering dust on a wall somewhere in the City of Brass. It was a trophy won by a fire giant in a card game from the Suutan bloodline that once donned it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. We got to go find--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be hanging on a pub wall somewhere, correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's a trophy. It's too valuable to be in a pub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know where fire giants might hang out? Or anything about the Suutan bloodline?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's on somebody's wall as a trophy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should ask somebody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it could be in a noble's house, for all we know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we see anyone who looks remotely like us, who's not from the Fire Plane, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as he does, you watch as the criss-cross chains that hold the gate shut suddenly shift, and you watch dust and ash get shaken free from the chains as they're all suddenly pulled upward through these rings to the very top, and the doors shift open very slowly, giving just enough space for people of your physical width to pass through. Grog, you have to squeeze a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good sir, one question before we enter your city, since you are such a good friend and we look forward to possibly being friends again someday. Where would one find people who enjoy the sport of watching large creatures battle? If you could think of such a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Welcome to the City of Brass."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love your answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys walk in, the doors close behind and you watch as the chains that were pulled free, that now dangle loosely, automatically, on their own, strike up like snakes, instantly, and flash back through on the other side. You can hear them retying themselves between the ring-loops to seal off the doorway once again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in a city where everyone is going to

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not necessarily. Act really fucking tough, dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, everyone wants to kick our ass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we get some jail tattoos before we continue?

lines.name: SCANLAN
lines.text: I can make us all look really rough and ragged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no, let's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you say "let's" and it trails off, you all take a moment to look into the city around you. Marquet offered Ank'Harel, a very beautiful city of ornate culture. This city has been around far longer, and has been constructed by far more intricate artisans since. You see hundreds of buildings of different sizes, all constructed from various types of materials, many of them metallic and brass or bronze in color, reflecting the ever-present sunlight from the sky. You can see buildings carved from dark black obsidian. From other forms of darkened stone you can see natural rock formations of blackened rock and stone jutting outward, where, crafted from that, you can see communities of maybe dozens of buildings and homes that have been constructed from it. You can see towers that are impossibly high, hundreds of feet up in the sky, some broken from previous conflicts and never constructed since. You can see a series of streets that intertwine out before you with these tiny little cobblestones that all seem to have a matching, ruddy, brownish earth tone with a dusting of ash and red earth scattered across them. You see throughout here human beings occasionally. You see dozens upon dozens of efreeti, walking around, crusted with jewelry and wearing fine robes and linens. You can begin to notice quickly that many of these efreeti walk along with some of these humans, these humans walk at their sides, some in chains.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a number of individuals pedaling small carts through, also in comparable levels of enslavement. But not all are enslaved. There are individuals from other areas you've never recognized, various features. You see two humanoids that walk around by themselves, their features are human but not. There's something about them that's a little off, but you can't quite pick up what, and they walk off in the distance. There is a gathering of many cultures that make their way through here, but definitely the dominant culture here appears to be one ruled by the elemental fire djinn that you've already encountered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The servants, the humans, and I don't know if there's any elves, dwarves, halflings, or anything in the mix, but people who are not from here, how does their health appear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fine, if perpetually uncomfortable in the current weather, which is, for the record, we're hitting somewhere between 110°F to 120°F in the air at all times here. I'd say, actually, in fact, at this time, I'd like everyone to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get advantage because of the fire resist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. And actually, you having fire-resistant armor, I would say you do not have to make it, Vax. You feel naturally more comfortable in here based on the resistance you've given your enchantment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have to roll? Or am I good to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six! I'm going to use one of my Resolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And slightly better: 15.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For the time you've been here, it's been an unwelcoming atmosphere, but not one that has been so harsh as to press down upon your physical constitution. You all seem to withstand the current atmosphere for now, but you do gather that the longer you are here, the more difficult it will be to endure this atmosphere without detrimental effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I meant to note I wanted to put my Ring of Protection on and put the cloak away when we took that short rest. I don't know if I said that out loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not say that out loud

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it takes some time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. So what do you wish to do now that you've gained entry into the City of Brass?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's find that armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep walking. Let's keep walking and see what we see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we walk the fuck forward. Should we get a little farther into the city or should I cast it right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the city's huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, how long does that spell last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the other question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, could you recognize fire giants if you saw one? Are they akin to stone giants?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think so. I don't think I've ever seen one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not seen a fire giant in person in all the time that you've spent on this plane.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet I can pick it out, though, if it's giant and it's made of fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're like, that's a fire giant. All right, yeah, totally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten minutes-- and the other question is if you can change into a flying creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any humans around right now who look like they're not slaves? Who look well-off, relatively?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've literally just walked into the city and this is your first glance at the first street that you've encountered. As you guys begin to walk farther into the city, one thing that you do notice, too, is there are these stationary torches that meet at various crossroads. And at the top of these torches there is a ball of flame that is flickering and shooting off spurts here and there, and every now and then you hear one go (flaring) in the distance and that's what you were seeing on the other side of the wall. These flames cause this dancing light source effect throughout the entire city due to the vastly metallic nature of the building construct here. And so as you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow. That might be the worst shirt you've ever worn on the show.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll be shirtless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm bringing you a new shirt for your birthday, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: "Okay, I farted. It was me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy moly. Bring it back, people. I'm specifically looking for a human who is not a slave, who looks reasonably well off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking for social gatherings, pubs, and otherwise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to talk to Vex as soon as we get a hot second, whenever that falls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you guys are walking, keeping your eyes out before yourselves, you guys engage in conversation as you continue into the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, so we both have the Locate Object spell. It lasts for ten minutes and we can both fly. We could both cast it and maybe do like a perimeter run, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, how long does it last?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get a long fucking way in ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if we're flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. That's clutch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I could also potentially Polymorph into something or Beast Shape into something that-- Has there been any type of creatures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flying creatures here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the air?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe wyverns or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen any, at the moment. You have seen, so far, efreeti being capable of flight, both from your previous encounter and the two at the gate that just jettisoned off in your direction before landing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, are they considered humanoid-ish? To where I could Alter Self to look like an efreeti?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A teeny, tiny efreeti.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Teeny, teeny efreeti? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. From your Alter Self ability? No. They are far too different in size, physiology, and appearance to pass off as an efreet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any humanoids like, like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A fire elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or like dragonborn, or like what's the thing that Zahra is? I'm drawing a blank right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wyverns? Lizardpeople?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tieflings?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tieflings, are there like any tieflings around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep an eye out as you continue walking forward. You don't see any yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to look for the most unsubjugated humanoids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you keep an eye out as you progress. And you're looking for--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyone who looks like they're not a servant, who looks like they're maybe getting by well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, kind of the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Continuing farther into the city. This whole city has this vibrant life to it, from the way it reflects light from the ever-changing, flickering skylight from the sun, to the flames that adorn every single conjunction of roads that make their way through the city, to occasionally, you will see cracks in the ground where a flame will flare out then retract within. Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we also keep an eye out for anything flying? I want to see if anything's flying around the city at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their eyes tend to have a non-human appearance to them, the iris a light-orangish color. They have long white and gold robes and are walking alongside a tiefling of similar red skin to the color of the efreeti here, with deep gray, long hair that goes behind a ridge of horns that curl into almost like ram horns in the front, and the long, gray hair extends to the mid-back. They both walk along side by side, their arms within their robes-- both are wearing matching white and gold robes-- and they each step out from the alley and begin to walk ahead of you guys about 60, 70 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's these two strange beings with strange eyes and a tiefling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one entity that's the strange being and the other is a tiefling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, that sounds ridiculous, it is, I'm a stranger in a strange land. Could I borrow you just for a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just got to hell, haven't even unpacked my bags--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No warning, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know what, follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both continue to walk in the direction they're walking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're together, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're together, but they face away from you. He's just, "Follow me." And they both continue walking ahead of you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so I trip along behind them, and then I turn around and to the group I go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with this. This is a great way to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're following along behind them.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY, TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do like an insight check, like size up this tiefling from a distance and see what they might be about, get any idea about what they might do or be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an insight check from what very little bit of body language you can see. It's going to be very hard to read anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Unfortunately, at the distance that he was from you, about 60 feet or so, and what little bit time he was faced away-- his interaction with Vax was so short, it's a blank slate. Nothing you can read off of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they looking and talking to each other at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not talking to each other, they're looking, facing away from you, and walking the same pace they were. However, Vex, since you were looking up in the sky, you do see, for a brief instant, a large, avian-like entity--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does "avian" mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bird-like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --but massive. And it looks to leave some sort of flame-like trail behind it as it (fiery whooshing).

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) A phoenix!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Harry Potter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fawkes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! Oh. Intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew. Eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Yeah, it's a flaming bird!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a fucking bird, y'all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they have birdies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So is it one of those-- what were they called, Ashley?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Natural 20 on the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MATT
