lines.text: Just don't do that because it doesn't matter! All you're doing is killing yourself, Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys continue to follow these two--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, where are they leading me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys keep the same distance? Do you catch up with them, do you stay behind, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far back are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 60 feet behind them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone should--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get a little closer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to wave them away a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to drop another 20 feet back from the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you drop back from them, you come pretty close to the two efreeti that are following you from behind, and one of them puts his hand out and grabs you by the shoulder and pats you and goes, "So friend, you are--? You are--?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Heh. I like this one. We'll keep him." And he pats you on the shoulder and they both walk--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! And I smash the Titanstone Knuckles together and I cast Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance over you can see Grog has swollen to his enlarged size and is now walking shoulder to shoulder with the two efreeti that began to flank from behind. They both take a step back. "I double "down on my statement. We keep him." And they keep walking shoulder to shoulder to you. They're not doing anything, they're walking shoulder to shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stop and turn around and wait for them to catch up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. I hang back as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys, hanging back--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to keep a little closer to the two in the front and try to see if I can overhear their conversation at all if they talk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to hang back until they come up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not hanging back; I am right in the middle. I'm trying to, like, be that middle point that keeps everything connected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is like when your friends start to drink at the Ren Faire and you're like, should we keep going forward, or what do we do, do we wait?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll meet you at the axe-throwing, just go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: To the oubliette!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just put it all out on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So are they keeping pace with me, or are they standing next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're keeping pace with you as you're walking. You're walking shoulder to shoulder as the rest of you begin to slow down and catch up except for Vex, Vax, and Percy, who continue forward. We have Pike, Keyleth, and Scanlan beginning to catch up with Grog, and as you guys eventually get to the point where you're walking slow enough that the two efreeti catch up behind you, they keep walking with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light up my flame hand and I turn to one of the efreeti and I go: Fist bump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pound it, man. Pound it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's at disadvantage. Come on, Keyleth!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll high, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you want? Persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at your fist and flicks it. It does sting a little. It doesn't do any damage but the flame goes out. In fact, it's strange. Normally the flames would stay, but it's almost like he willed the flame in your hand to extinguish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a question for one of you fine gentlemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, we're all getting in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one on the other side of Grog, that wasn't interacting with Keyleth, grunts. "Hmph."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you guys--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (imitating efreeti) We're both women.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I'm so sorry. Anyway. Do either of you happen to know where the temple of Pelor is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both slowly look at each other and grin. And slowly nod their heads.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They turn back and one of them goes, "Yes, we do, actually. Would you like us to take you there?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can just show us where it is. I think there's going to be a couple more spots we're going to stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is dangerous to wander these streets unaccompanied."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I got this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, we've been here five minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He extends a hand next to you, a very large hand, and he says, "Come. I will carry you to your destination."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't like to be carried. I don't like to be made to feel smaller than I am, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then let us continue to walk. We will want to take a left at the next big juncture." They both keep walking alongside the two of you. While this is happening, you guys are keeping behind and glancing over your shoulder and seeing the rest of your party slowly gather at the knees of these two walking, haughty-looking djinn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clears throat) Yeah, I was hoping for a little bit of advice about town. This is starting to feel a little kinky. Where are we going? I don't need to talk that bad. Where are we going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is to the tiefling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tiefling looks over his shoulder towards you and goes, "We are going to-- (groans). All "right, this just got very-- If you look ahead, one alley, we are going to dart to the right. Follow, quickly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Follow you to talk right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they begin taking up their pace a little bit, quickening their walk, almost like a light jog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys keep up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. What the fuck are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I don't fucking know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys look ahead and you see the other three members, the rest of your party, beginning to get farther away from you at a faster pace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's me and you. Are you coming? Are you still in the middle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping pace, but I'm trying to be at the back end of it. What's happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, we're going to go in the alley up ahead to the right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dart to the right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep pace with Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm with them, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (exclaims) Just trying to be even simpler than I am. Maybe then they won't want me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're probably making it worse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Following up at pace with them, you get past a couple of small intersections and the two figures dart off into this small alley, right off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth by going into the alley?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before going into the alley. I mean, I don't know how dark this is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you stealthing behind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in broad daylight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pretty-- heh. I'm not going to say it, but the sun is high in the sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (McCree voice) It's full sunlight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (McCree voice) It's lunchtime.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so no changing in lighting in the smaller alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (McCree voice) It's just turned to PM.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The efreeti behind us, are they paying attention to us, or are they completely distracted by all of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. They don't seem to be paying any mind, and when the two figures darted off in the alleyway, there was no--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how far away from the other group are we at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you're about 80 feet in front of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I stop her and stop at the corner and look around. Do I even see them if I look around the corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two figures that darted off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're about 15 feet back and they're both waiting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw them dart to the right. I don't know what's in there! I go running in with my eyes closed. That's how I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, do you follow suit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I follow suit, yeah. I'm running in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The three of you dart in. You guys watch as the three of them vanish into that alley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the efreeti react to them vanishing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but that's about two intersections ahead. The ones immediately before you, the efreet goes, "Turn left. To Pelor's temple."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For god's sake, you two, tell them that you have to meet your owner!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Do it. Tell them that we've got to meet our owner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Left to Pelor's temple, small one!" As you guys are coming to the intersection--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so sorry, what did you say? Left at where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right here."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're supposed to meet out master at the temple of Pelor, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I am taking you. Take a left."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cast a Zone of Truth and ask him some questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hold on a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that a bad idea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are no good ideas anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what I would have done was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes you get lucky with a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all the game is is getting lucky with bad ideas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're Cubs fans walking down Cleveland Boulevard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as you begin casting your spell-- because casting a spell is a very physical thing-- you begin to whisper your various divine incantations beneath your breath, and your holy symbol of Sarenrae begins to glow, though diminished this far from the Prime Material plane, still effective. You get partway through your incantation before the two efreeti who are flanking grab Grog by the shoulders and forcefully push, like a giant wedge, trying to shove your entire group to the left down the street. You, being at the immediate brunt of that, basically are getting shoved in the shoulder and off to the side. I need you to make a constitution saving throw to see if you maintain concentration on the spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You busting out the Hand Cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm busting out the Hand Cone, ready to go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so as you're partway through the incantation before it gets completely scattered halfway through and the spell is lost. You still used the spell slot, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they're now using Grog as the base point and all three of them are pushing you all to the left forcefully. Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are these humanoids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to start singing. I pick one, the stronger of the two, and I'm going to sing at him. Or her, I don't even know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around and sing in their face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yep, singing at them. (singing) I make you want to leave the one you're with, start a new relationship with me. That's how it's going to be, make you go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Usher! Usher from 1999!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little Usher. I'm going to cast Dominate Monster on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit, okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Do they know they're being dominated?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, but hopefully it'll give us a getaway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's my spell, right? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus Christ, dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the angriest thing I've ever heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's a wisdom saving throw--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can always break it or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's not break it, but be careful, be mindful. All right, so, wisdom saving throw. Two on that. All righty. The efreet that is on the left side, the one that is directly behind you-- the other one that's pushing Pike off to the side is separate-- the one that's behind you, as you turn around and begin singing up to it, it stops in its tracks and nods its head to the beat as you're singing and its eyes half-close for a second, and you get the assertion that the spell has taken effect. The other ally is still pushing Grog and Pike and basically scooping you guys into this alleyway to the left.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast Hold Person on that one? I think I can do it on a humanoid.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: But he's not a humanoid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's not humanoid, never mind! That's what you literally were just talking about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I command him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, am I standing by Scanlan? Are they in front of us now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're behind you, basically you got like shoved off at the point. Scanlan turned around and did that as Pike's being shoved off to the side. And Grog, they're both shoulder to shoulder shoving you in that direction. So that was your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't also command him to do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't I command him to do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, I'm getting to that point. All of this is happening simultaneously. As you're doing that, singing in the face of that efreet, you just got knocked out of your spell, so you're going to have to take a moment to do that. Keyleth, Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to trip and fall flat down onto the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you (grunting) and intentionally fall prone on the ground. All righty. Keyleth, what are you doing? If anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I don't want to do something I'm really bad at, which is talking to people. I have ideas. Okay, is this what I want to do, I'm going to do Alter Self and I'm going to change myself into a tiefling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I-- oh god this is really terrible, oh my god, I am really bad at deception-- I'm going to turn around and say, I'm sorry, there seems to be a miscommunication. These are my slaves. They are already owned and my property. Release them immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as Scanlan's in the middle of singing a song, and the one efreet stops in their tracks, you turn around and your form shifts. What do you want your tiefling to look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I don't have a lot to go off of except for Zahra and that one that was in front of us, so I'm going to do Zahra, like a red. You know, a red, with like devilly horns, definitely give it a tail. I want to look intimidating. I want to look like you wouldn't want to meet me in a back alley, but that's where we are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A bad bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A bad bitch.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Bad bitch tiefling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is still, like, an eighth as intimidating as an efreet. But you whip around and you say this, I'm going to have you go ahead and make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Keyleth! You got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just a straight roll. Oh, god. Oh Jesus Christ. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you're talking up to the one on the left, as Grog falls forward, he's looking off down and he's going to reach for him as you shout in his face. (scoffs) And palms you in the face with his hand, and I need you to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A saving throw. Oh, that was almost so good, that was almost great! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing with your command over the efreet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all going to be okay if you yell at your friend to let us go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The efreet that you control turns around and goes, "Hey! This is not our business. We need to "let them go." The other efreet goes, "What are you talking about? They're at our disposal!" He looks back at the first one who goes, "It doesn't matter. Let them go. Now." The other one looks down at you and looks at the other one. That's cocked. And glances down at you, Scanlan, and goes, "What have you done to my friend?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say to him: I'm just a mere slave and-- kill him! Kill him now! Kill him right now! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to make a-- actually, for Dominate--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get up and run, you guys. You better fucking run away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anyone else in this alley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, from what you can see-- You can't see anything, you're on the ground prone right now. You're surrounded by everyone shouting at each other at this moment. From what you can see, nobody else is in this alleyway at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's crazy city, people fight all the time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're used to this, this is everyday life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there are fights on every corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so the efreet that you control, who's still staring at the friend, looks at you as you shout this, grins, and grabs the other efreet by the throat and slams him into the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down the alleyway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go catch up with them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it's holding the other efreet against the wall, his thumbs pushing into his throat like (choking), it's reaching up and grabbing the back of the hands, its legs flailing as bits of smoke and ash being cast off, Keyleth runs past, this tiefling fucking running as fast as you can down the alleyway. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pop up, grab Pike, and start running after Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you grab her by the back of the armor and lift her up off the ground. Pike, you start running, but all of a sudden your feet are off the ground, you're running in the air, as Grog is like bounding with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm hoping that as we get towards the door I can shrink back down to go through any doorway that they're headed towards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're heading towards an alleyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an alleyway, is what you can see, that Keyleth darts off into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am staying put until my friends are far away. I'm watching them, watching them, back and forth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you watch as the one efreet holding his friend against the wall there is like (strained grunt). The one that's being choked goes, (choking) "What's this?" He reaches down and pulls a blade out of the side and begins jabbing it into the arm of the guy who's holding him.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TALIESIN
lines.text: Run. Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which does six damage there, and he gets to make a saving throw because he took damage. So he's like, stabbing him in the arm repeatedly. The other guy's like (grunting), still pushing into his throat, and he takes him, lifts him up, and slams him into the other wall, causing him to drop the dagger in the other hand, and begins to push him down towards the ground. You can see his eyes, still intense, but controlled by the spell as he's pushing the other efreet into the dark stonework and you can see it cracking and breaking against the force. The other efreet now is being held against their-- (foreign language) and begins chanting something beneath his breath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. They do magic shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, they do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought they were just big and scary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's currently chanting under his breath and you watch as the words begin to emit, his form begins to shimmer and change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far have my allies gotten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're glancing around the alleyway, at this point in time, full pace, full round, you see Grog and Pike have just now disappeared around the corner of that alleyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Keyleth is gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth is gone. She got there before they did. Actually, you guys would have caught up pretty fast because of Grog's speed. So Keyleth would have gotten a head start and then Grog bypassed her, so you just see Keyleth disappear behind the corner of the alleyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll snag Keyleth, too. I've got them both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. So my work here is done, so I'm going to tip my beret, good day to you both, and I'll Dimension Door into the alley with them or wherever they went. Actually, I don't know that alley, so I'm going to go in that direction the number of feet I think it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you'll be appearing at the mouth of that alleyway and you can dart into it. I would say go ahead and make a stealth roll to see if the one who is currently casting even has a glance of seeing you out of the corner of his eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21! Stealth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the rest of them further down the alleyway now. You continue following them, I imagine?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to hide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do these alleyways connect? Does it block around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that you were pushed into, essentially as you were walking forward, is to the left. You guys continued forward past two more alleyways and then went to the second one to the right that way and so this one continues down and seems to curve around after about 100 feet or so through a series of buildings that are built right next to each other, giving you one pathway that curves out of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go as far away out of sight as we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys continue forward down that alley. You hear in the distance the muffled sounds of some sort of weird, echoey scuffle and it seems to vanish into the rest of the atmospheric sound of general wind being blown through tight passages and the occasional flare of flame. You all turn the corner as it begins to curve and suddenly there's another splinter alleyway that descends into stairs and, you guys following the two humanoid individuals you originally followed, continue down that path and they lead you into a small, enclosed room. There's a door that's partially ajar and they've shoved their way into it and disappear inside. Do you follow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's the option. Everybody's running for their lives right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys all dart into this same room. As you guys all charge into here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's filled with spikes and fire. As you go charging into this room, immediately it's much smaller that I think you all anticipated and it would be Vex and Vax getting there first. You guys charge into the room and your darkvision helps you as you adjust to the change of light, just in time for you to run into the two individuals that had led you in there. This is some sort of a storage room, filled with a series of metallic boxes. And this room could comfortably fit five people. And as soon as you charge, you ram into their shoulder and before you can turn, all of a sudden, you watch as Grog with two other people comes slamming in and you've all very tightly squeezed into this dark space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I climb and sit on top of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Scanlan comes around the corner--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right in behind Grog's butt. Just smooshed on up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a terrible thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it tight enough that the two strangers are smooshed in as badly as we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're like, (strained) "Okay-- please-- "

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dark. There's no light in here, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lift my hand and I light it up to give us a little bit of light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we close the door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, close the door!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled) Why are we in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any windows or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a storage shed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a little more than I think I was asking for, but what is there to see in the City of Brass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're asking this right now? He looks at you. "You're asking this right now?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're out of sorts. We're not from here, obviously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi. That's my sister. You can tell because she looks just like me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a very small room!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't look like many of the larger folk-- thank you, dear-- that we've seen around here either. Are you from here? Are you strangers here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you not slaves right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me change this to a bit of a calmer circumstance, here-- the tiefling says, "Shh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh! Close the door!" And it is like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I climb up on one of the boxes to give more foot room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, as silence passes for a bit, you hear a voice, a very soft and gentle voice that you haven't heard yet, break the darkness. He goes, "I think it's safe to speak now." The lithe-looking individual you saw earlier with the wiry red hair and the somewhat reddish-black eyes says, "Well, "it was uncommon to see individuals wandering this city with a look of absolute victimization."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled) We don't look that bad, do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pick up Scanlan and put him up on a box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those aren't pillows!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think Grog wears underpants!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm Senokir. This is Uten, my business partner. We are jewelers here in the City of "Brass. And if I'm not mistaken, you now owe us a favor."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, you were looking for a jeweler, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's a little far away at the moment, but we could do a bit of business because we have other business to attend to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What caught your attention on us, aside from the utter look of pathetic-ness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Favors are more useful when you're not in chains."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, this is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Let us wait here about ten, 15 more moments. Let any immediate chance of you running "into those thugs pass. We'll have a more private conversation at our place of business, if you "don't mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you wear those white robes? Do they signify anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They signify our freedom."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were you once in chains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Few that come here manage to escape that fate immediately. We found our way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's ominous. Can I do an insight check? Does that mean he murdered a lot of fricking people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go druid dice. Oh god. Ooh, it's an 18! What was it, insight? Right? 29.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you've got really high insight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She know shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers! Loot Crate, everybody! Loot Crate is a wonderful sponsor, a fine, handsome company.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Their theme is magic. You'll get a box of magic shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doctor Strange is part of this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I think Magical Beasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are movies that I will never see, because I have children.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In about 15 years, we're going to sit down and show you everything. It's going to be great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one was the tiefling, and which one was him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's been speaking to you is the other humanoid of strange racial origin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Senokir is the humanoid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Senokir is the humanoid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is, something's off about him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something's different. You don't recognize his race or background.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uten, how long have the two of you been in business together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh, let us wait. We will continue this conversation at our establishment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this your room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whose room is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea. Which is why we shouldn't stay long."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know where those thugs were trying to take us? Or have an idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea, but I imagine they would have called in some friends to meet you and you "would have found yourselves in a very tough position."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, it's really starting to smell like Grog in here, so why don't we go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few more moments, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was really hard not to fight, man. I do terrible when I don't fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh." You wait in awkward silence for the next five minutes, with any sort of sound, utterance, or conversation being immediately shushed by Senokir. Eventually--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (fart sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Senokir pulls something from a pocket and glances at the rest of you. He pricks his finger and places it to the edge of this object, some sort of a disk, and it has a small point on one end that he uses to prick his finger. Once he's smeared his blood on the disk, he presses it against the door, and the iron door opens up a little bit. Places it in his pocket. "Come inside, so we may speak, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to look in his eyes as we are about to go through and see if-- how honest he looks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, everybody in this city wants us as slaves, so it's not really any more dangerous in there than it is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kind of flattering, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like one of those beefcake slave auctions for charity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing at him, he's a very hard individual to read. He has this awkward, stilted conversational cadence to his way of speaking, and whenever he speaks to you, he's not quite looking at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, my eyes are down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't seem dishonest, just hard to read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I like your hair. And I walk in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many substances and things that you've never seen before. A couple of small boxes to the side of rough, uncut gems, currently at this distance--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up and smack Percy on the ass and say, "Feel like making a home here?" and walk past him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm certainly thinking of some plans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the door closes behind and the two individuals walk in, they rummage around and begin finding some small stools and arrange them so they can present to you more like, treat you like a guest. He sets them down. "Please, sit, and we shall speak."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does Locate Object take to cast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's not something you would ask

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea these words you speak." All right, Locate Object. Locate Object is one action, so it takes six seconds to cast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to cast it as we sit down and see if it's in our vicinity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can cast that shit all the time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often can you cast it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's a 2nd-level spell, so I can do it a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as everyone's sitting on your stools and getting ready, you close your eyes for a second, concentrate, mutter beneath your breath. You extend your understanding in this dark space around you, waiting for the warmth of any sort of call to the Dawnmartyr Plate. Eventually your mental expansion reaches the limitations of the spell, with nothing coming back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight, tight, tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you've all sat down and assembled, Senokir sits as well, hands crossed very pleasantly in front of him. Very up straight, strange head cocked a little to the side. "So "you've found yourselves here, out of place, and we've helped you once. We will discuss the terms "of our repayment for our aid. But before then, I must ask why you would come here so unprepared."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So unprepared? Does the name Thordak ring a bell? The Cinder King? It's a pseudonym, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have heard this name."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alias.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he hang out around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. He stayed mostly over the Sea of Fire."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm. Anywho!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about that Plate of--? No? Maybe? I mean, I don't know, what are we here for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are you here for?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thordak has escaped into our realm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Keep him away from here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, that's what we want as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a distaste for the wyrm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I just don't trust dragons."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's currently still linked to this realm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are trying to take care of as much of it as humanly possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Heh. Humanly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As much as humanly possible. Perhaps a little bit more. We are here for the little bit more. We seek powers to help us defeat the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps I can be of aid. What powers do you seek?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What powers can you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I asked my question first."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So creepy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps it is time to lay it on the line. Time is of the essence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make a deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If this goes south, we can just wrap it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We seek a set of plate armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A trinket, really. Nothing huge. Somebody won it in a game of poker, I believe? Cards?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A card game of some sort.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Plate of the Dawnmartyr.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It used to belong to the Suutan Bloodline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Suutan, now that I am aware of."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does it still belong in the possession of this Suutan?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our information says it does not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was won by a fire giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A fire giant within this city?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is our belief.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any fire giants in this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That narrows it down. There are only three that live here--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well that's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--not under subjugation."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happen to have their names?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do people under subjugation own a lot?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Generally, no. Those that own them, own what they own. So maybe it's one of them. We can "go ask."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Relatively. Depending on which one you ask first."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could just give us their addresses or something and we could go check it out. If you had a Thomas Guide--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Uten? What's Uten doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uten is sitting back, arms crossed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He seems totally chill? This is the way this dude talks all the fucking time? (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Completely unfazed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Depending on how things go, we may even speak of perhaps commissioning some pieces. Your work is astounding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He suddenly leans forward, steps up from the stool, and walks over to you and begins to look very closely over your clothing. "Can you afford what I make?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Depending on how the next few weeks go, there will be much to celebrate, and your work is celebratory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you require monetary compensation, or is it something more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. To keep this interesting, how about we go find "this armor?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't even want to hint at what you're looking for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's the fun in that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cheeky bastard, Matthew Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. To the giant?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we make ourselves not look like us? Should we maybe look like something different?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how will you keep us from being harassed in the streets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I mean no disrespect, but--" He lifts his hand and snaps the fingers. You watch as Uten goes, "Oh, right, sorry. I got you." He goes rummaging through a case and you hear what sounds like the dragging and clanging of many pieces of small metal. Procures a series of chains and neck irons. Senokir looks up. "There's not much else I have to offer but, for the most part, you won't be "bothered."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me put forward a theory for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You son of a bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you. Whatever deal we make with you here, for the record, none of us will be staying. We may be coming back to fulfill some service, we may be coming back to fulfill some favor, and we will if that is the deal we make.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If that is the deal we make."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But the deal we make will not include any of us. Is that understood? Is that agreeable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless it's for a one-time sexual favor of some sort.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In which case, take your pick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm up, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, you people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you will find our arrangements agreeable."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I may have some things to excite you with, as well. Stop it! I know you've been doing it all game!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said in accent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems we've found some semblance of an accord for the time. Come, place these gently upon "yourselves and we'll be on our way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have any white robes you can give us instead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, no. Those come with station, and station requires recognition. None will recognize "you here. You'll be found out immediately."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we chain ourselves to each other, or to you? How does this work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check out those chains and see if they're magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A few of us could look like you, to keep all of us out of chains? Maybe a few exceptions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can get big and then look like an efreeti?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we'd all feel a little bit comfortable if some of us were free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure. If you are confident."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I study him and I change to like a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe somebody that is better at talking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have to talk, I just have to look like someone else. That's not that hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh for god's sakes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go look at the chains and arcana check them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like, eh? Eh? Passable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 22! No, just 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are heavy, they are thick, they are definitely functional, but they are not enchanted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to slap some on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to slip on my ring of invisibility and spend the next 20 minutes attuning to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks you over. "Impressive. I think you will get no concern from myself when the other "genasi cross your way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slowly) Do all of you talk like this? Do I also need to talk like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know what you mean."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go put the chains on, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put the chains on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to put them on, but I don't want to click them. I want to hang them and make them look like they're attached, but I don't want to attach them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They fall to the floor!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are they wrist or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one for each wrist and then a neck iron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm familiar with these because I have a set in my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course you do. The idea is, your hands are chained, and the chains attack to the neck iron about there, so you don't have a whole lot of arm movement, and then the neck iron has a chain from the back that is held. And actually, Uten begins to gather all the chains at the very back and runs them to a singular ring, which is held by him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I put on, if I put on my Glove of Storing, does that mean I have to take off one of the gauntlets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glove of Storing, yeah. You wouldn't be able to have both attuned because they're both on the hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I wear one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for insanity's sake, before I slip them on, I'm going to take a little bit of gunpowder out of my pouch and sprinkle a little bit in the locks and have some on my hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to blow your little hands off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's going to be awful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Victor voice) "Learn from my mistakes!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not enough to blow a hand off, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, you manage to get them clicked on, and as soon as you feel confident, they go (clank) and hang open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I must have not attached them quite right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to do it for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, that's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As all of the chains are attached, some time has passed. You've attuned to your ring. What have you un-attuned to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My boots have gone slack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come, now, let us all go speak with Whaska."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He didn't chain me, though, right? Am I chained? There's no invisible floating chain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he doesn't seem like he's intent on chaining all of you. He just chained those that couldn't pass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whaska the giant. Whaska the giant, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Vex chained?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tweak her nose and give her a wet willy, and then dart six feet back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You fucking dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now come! Uten, come." And he walks out the front door, this time. As you guys are led through the two front doors, as they open, as Senokir pushes them, you see this wonderful thoroughfare in front with a giant fountain that has this molten rock, this lava fountain, that pours out into this large, open pit that descends into darkness below. You see these giant, black, obelisk-like pillars that jut out in the center, and probably about two dozen entities from all walks of life walking through and having conversations and talking, many of which having their own chained slaves at their side. This appears to be one of many central social civil places within the City of Brass. And that's where we'll end tonight's session.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the people that have the people in chains, are they wearing the white robes and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Different outfits. It appears that it isn't like, the white robes signify that a person is free. Just for these two, it's a level of station, it seems, in the way they've described it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Had we stopped in one more minute, I would have had to take off this shirt, revealing nothing underneath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The void.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lava pouring in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll grab Ashley, run into the fire plane, the armor will be right there, for her visit, and then it'll be done! One shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not filming next Thursday, are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hope not. That's the first day of that next episode, so I don't have the schedule yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me know. If you're not scheduled, we'll try and Skype you in, because I would still like you to continue this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will. I'll have to Skype, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. Just having you here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to have you back, man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's better when you're here!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well, okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really better when you here. It's not good when you're not here. In fact, don't watch when she's not here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you ended the game and I was like, "No! What? We just-- oh."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been four hours! I know. Well, guys, thank you for watching. I hope you had fun, as we do, in this insanity.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love this character so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's my new favorite. The week

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's just how it worked out, guys!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll never see Victor again. I have a new best friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
